properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c1 c2 v2 c1 c2 v3 c1 c2 v4 c1 c2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Kwa Yesu ni tambalale,
tambalale tambalale
kwa Mungu hakuna milima,
tambalale tambalale.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
{Tambalale — tambalale
tambalale tambalale.
Tambalale — tambalale
tambalale hakuna milima.
(Kweli tambalale) tambalale
tambalale tambalale.
Tambalale — tambalale
tambalale hakuna milima.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hakuna magonjwa,
dhiki wala njaa
hakuna tatizo,
mbinguni ni raha.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hakuna dhuluma,
wala ufisadi
hakuna tajiri,
wote kwake sawa.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hakuna ulevi,
hakuna uzinzi,
hakuna huzuni,
wote ni furaha.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mbinguni kwa Baba,
makao ni mengi
tujipange sawa
tukaishi naye.
